NIS didn't dub all the voices in the japanese version, and also removed the japanese voices for those not dubbed dialogs.

There's another version that removes the english voices and puts the whole japanese voices back. (search for metafalica undub)

NIS also introduced a bug that causes a hang in a certain battle. There's a patch here, which works in both nis and undubbed versions: <a href="
http://asmodean.reverse.net/pages/ar2bugfix.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://asmodean.reverse.net/pages/ar2bugfix.html</a>
